content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Mr. Abbasi, I'm glad you're interested in the apartment. It's a wonderful space in a prime location. How much were you considering for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mr. Schmidt. I'm really looking forward to potentially living in such a great apartment. Regarding the rent, I was thinking it would be fair to start at 500 Euros per month, considering it's an unfurnished apartment in the city center. What do you think?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: 500 Euros per month is a very reasonable starting point, considering the location and the facilities nearby. However, I'm always open to negotiations. Would you be willing to pay a little bit more for such a prime location?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Mr. Schmidt. While I'm definitely interested in the location, I'm on a budget as a student. Could we perhaps meet somewhere in the middle? How about 550 Euros per month? I think that would be a fair compromise.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: As a landlord, I'm always looking to find a balance that is fair for both parties. 550 Euros per month is certainly closer to what I'm looking for, but I'm willing to go even lower if you're able to make a longer-term commitment. How long were you planning to stay?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm planning to stay for at least two years, Mr. Schmidt. I value stability and I'm looking for a place I can call home for the foreseeable future. Would a two-year lease help us reach an agreement on the rent?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: A two-year lease would indeed be very helpful in reaching a mutually agreeable rent price. If you're willing to commit to two years, I'm willing to lower the rent to 525 Euros per month. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's an excellent offer, Mr. Schmidt. 525 Euros per month with a two-year lease is very competitive and aligns well with my budget. I'm happy to accept this offer. TERMINATE
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran
